reviewText:
Early Access Review

This is about as bare-bones as bare-bones gets.  I'm not going to condemn it as a bad purchase yet since it was $7, but this is the reason I can't stand Early Access.

The game, in total, has about 10 screens.  The information you have is minimal. The only real options you have to do are to pick up free agents, edit tactics, which are three sliders, and press continue.  Any sort of stats are minimal to nonexistent.  I played for 10 minutes and literally I found and exhausted everything there was in the game.

On a lighter note, I don't want to completely write off this game.  I think it has a lot of potential, it's just cursed with the evil early access" label.  The best description for the game is: wildy incomplete.  Give it a few months before there's any sort of substance to the game.  I want to like it and I will certainly try again
date: but as of the time I'm writing this
recommended: there's virtually no game to speak of."

reviewText:
Early Access Review

As the DEV-s described DO NOT buy the game (unless you a crazy DOT..MOBA fan as me OR you want to follow the development of this great game) because atm its not worth it.
The concept is great, but I'm very courious:
Will the devs handle to make a good and long dot... moba gameplay in the future? This will definetly be the key.
Good Luck DEV-s keep it up !
I will often update my review during the new deploys:

CONS:

(However the devs start with this the Desc. of the game)
- AT THE MOMENT its definetly not worth it (Thats why its a NO for me)

reviewText:
Early Access Review

No.
No.
One thousand times.
No.

At the moment, don't bother. Game needs serious work. Also needs a good translator as the grammar is pretty bad.
There's no way to tell if the training sliders work.
At the beginning, you would think that you pick a league, and then you can pick a team in that league to manage, that is incorrect. You just pick the team, which has the league in a column to the left of it.
Text during a match goes way too fast, and not to mention the fact that there is a slider at the bottom of the match screen that does god knows what?
Did I mention the very poor english?
You just mindlessly click around trying to figure out what to do since there's no tutorial.
Can't tell if training is based on an individual or the team as a whole, since you can select each person on the team but the sliders for training don't change at all.
It also seriously needs more countries. The list there is a joke.
Wish tab worked as well when inputing text into fields.

Refunding and waiting for this game to get out of early access.
